overview: Those adorable, ever horny angels of mercy are back to make your temperature rise in a laugh and lust packed sequel to one of the best selling titles of all time. Candy Stripers Angie and Sarah are only interested in patients and partying â€“ but they'll have their hands full (in more ways than one!) with the trouble that's brewing at Northwest General. Dr. Fine's feelgood aphrodisiac gas has gotten loose, causing doctors, patients and nurses to throw their inhibitions to be wild!
title: Candy Stripers 2
